channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description:
I'm so close to getting my server online :D, but when i log into my server i get this error:
Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at Client.fullInStream(Client.java:3905) at Client.run(Client.java:11854) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (my pc) null
Can anyone help, so I can finally have my first RSPS up :confused:

item.title: Run Server Error
